description: Koharu`s Darumaka made its appearance when it was set out with Koharu`s other Pokémon so that Ash could see which Pokémon she had so he`d be interested in trading his Ash`s Scraggy with her. Koharu`s Darumaka was only seen briefly in the episode and did not have a significant role. None of its attacks are known.
name: Darumakka (Koharu)
